website_summaries.verdict: A refreshing bodywash that cleans well while being gentle on skin.
pros: Cleans well without drying out your skin or leaving a residue
cons: Some find the scent to be too strong

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: ... and everything in the Thymes Eucalyptus scent. The body wash lasts a LONG time, and smells heavenly while soaping up. My only wish is that the reed diffuser and candle had a stronger perfume, but that might not suit everyone. Personal bonus: I once rode a bicycle for miles through a eucalyptus forest in Portugal, so this scent always reminds me of that.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nicklaus

customer_reviews.title: Has its pluses and minuses.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, but doesn’t worth money spend. Scent is not so great. If I would use cheaper product I wouldn’t be able to tell the difference. Also doesn’t produce as much foam. I need to pour quite a bit be able to get enough foam on my shower sponge. Pluses are that my skin isn’t dry after using it and the scent stay on the skin for some time and doesn’t wash off right away.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: I’m in LOVE with Thymes!
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it’s the real deal ! Nothing smells better than Thymes ! It’s expensive but it’s made with the best ingredients. Hydrates your skin and the smell lasts all day !
customer_reviews.author: Tailoredsuits

customer_reviews.title: An invigorating smell!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little pricey but I buy it as a gift to myself. It makes the entire bathroom smell wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath time perfection
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance takes you bathing experience to another level. Makes my Sunday night bath a restful experience
customer_reviews.author: Carole Wilson Strickroth

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SMELL LIKE EUCALYPTUS
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell like eucalyptus AT ALL...smells like an old suitcase honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a let down....
customer_reviews.text: But I just can't get past how much this smells like the all purpose cleaner I use. I smell more lemon than eucalyptus unfortunately and it's like I spayed cleaner all over me. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand love the smell only use it for special showers because of its price point
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand love the smell only use it for special showers because of its price point
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fragrance. Used it at a friends house and decided I had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Walker

customer_reviews.title: The best! Love the ease of use and of course
customer_reviews.text: The best! Love the ease of use and of course, the wonderful fragrance :)
customer_reviews.author: agnes stangarone

customer_reviews.title: Thymes Eucalyptus Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and could not be more pleased. Hard product to find which is unfortunate as it is a really good one.
customer_reviews.author: Sloopy

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but love the scent and refresh feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Post

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: First used this product years ago at a high-end health club and spa where I was a member. The club provided all the Thymes Eucalyptus products, from body wash, lotion, hand soap, etc. for us to use after a good workout and shower. Fell in love with the crisp, clean fragrance. Bought a lot of the retail product for my home use. When the club was making a transition, I was able to purchase at close out prices. Glad to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R.O.

customer_reviews.title: A Body Wash of just Fresh Blitz
customer_reviews.text: Using this body wash product is worth every penny, You no only feel clean but also smell clean. The aroma and clean fragrance make you want to stay in the bathtub all day; it gives you a Morning lift and push. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: VSBrown

customer_reviews.title: expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a broken lid, so the bottle itself is not great quality or durable. The scent is a bit icky. Not calming.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and lovely
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Thymes fragrances, so I tried their body wash. It provides a wonderful, fresh scent and leaves my skin feeling soft. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Torres

customer_reviews.title: love this scent
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few years. I like the weight/feel of the product and the non-flowery scent suits me.
customer_reviews.author: FrancesM

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Good shower gel but not the typical eucalyptus scent. Had more flowery sent also included.
customer_reviews.author: KassyK

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products.
customer_reviews.text: This body wash doesn't smell like eucalyptus, but I love the scent. Everything in the Thymes line is a bit overpriced, but this body wash is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: F Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: It smells like Barbasol. I found it to be very watery ...
customer_reviews.text: It's highly perfumed, if that's what you're looking for. It's a very masculine scent, which was surprising. It smells like Barbasol. I found it to be very watery and a bit drying.
customer_reviews.author: TDF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and you smell like eculayptus when done showering! Get the cream as well!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell. I feel like very rich and pampered.
customer_reviews.author: Carole from NJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The best smelling eucalyptus anything. My husband loves it, so I treat him.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Arseneaux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this body wash!!!! Lathers well and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: MochaMama

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing scent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the body wash last yr for my daughter's Birthday gift and she just raved about it and loved it. She would never spend that amount of money on body wash. So this yr for her gift I sent her the body wash, body cream, and the cologne so she can layer. She is in Heaven! Loves the way she feels when she gets out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Bandics

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent & Rich Shower Gel
customer_reviews.text: The Thymes product line is the best. I have used many of their products - and all have the same quality, fresh scent and luxury. I highly recommend this product for yourself or an unexpected gift! Go ahead - spoil yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Cambria L Gallarde

customer_reviews.title: The scent to me was not of eucalyptus.
customer_reviews.text: I have liked a lot of the products but this one I I just don’t like the scent and the soap just is not soapy. I also would prefer instead of a cap that has to be taken off to use the body wash that they had the top.like in their dish soap which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

product_meta.title: Thymes Body Wash - 9.25 Fl Oz - Eucalyptus
feature_bullets: Hydrating Cleanser: Get ready to face the day with hydrating, emollient-rich botanical cleansers. This shower gel’s scent blooms when combined with water to lightly perfume skin with premium Thymes fragrance.
Artisan Design: Inspired by botanicals in art and nature, Thymes is passionate about creating products that have refreshing fragrances, high-quality ingredients, and beautiful presentation.
Fragrance Details: Eucalyptus - Invigorating eucalyptus oil. Crisp Italian lemon. Energizing petitgrain. Sweet bergamot. Lively lemongrass. Lush fir.
The Perfect Gift: With unique fragrances, artfully-designed packaging and botanically-based products, a gift from Thymes is sure to make your special someone smile.

Who We Are: Thymes carefully selects plant-based ingredients and naturally-derived botanical extracts that are rich in vitamins, beneficial nutrients, and vital antioxidants. Always cruelty-free and formulated without parabens and petrolatum.
